file.name: merchant_orders.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: https://api.mercadopago.com
info:
  title: Mercado Pago API Reference
  version: '1.0'
paths:
  /merchant_orders:
    post:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
      summary: Create order
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Create order
        spa: Crear orden
        por: Criar pedido
      description: Generate an order to associate it with the payment preference and obtain the necessary URL to start the payment flow
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Generate an order to associate it with the payment preference and obtain the necessary URL to start the payment flow
        spa: Genera una orden para asociarla a la preferencia de pago y obtén la URL necesaria para iniciar el flujo de pago
        por: Gerar uma ordem para associar com a preferência de pagamento e obter a URL necessária para iniciar o fluxo de pagamento
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              properties:
                external_reference:
                  type: string
                  description: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the order_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the id of their payment system
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the order_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the id of their payment system
                    spa: Identificador único que envía el vendedor para relacionar la order_id generada por Mercado Pago, con el id de su sistema de pagos
                    por: Identificador único enviado pelo vendedor para relacionar o order_id gerado pelo Mercado Pago ao ID do seu sistema de pagamento
                  example: default
                preference_id:
                  type: string
                  description: Identifier of the payment preference associated to the order
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Identifier of the payment preference associated to the order
                    spa: Identificador de la preferencia de pago asociado a la orden
                    por: Identificador da preferência de pagamento associada ao pedido
                  example: Preference identification
                marketplace:
                  type: string
                  description: Indicates if it is a Mercado Libre (MELI) or Mercado Pago (NONE) Marketplace payment
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Indicates if it is a Mercado Libre (MELI) or Mercado Pago (NONE) Marketplace payment
                    spa: Indica si es un pago de Marketplace de Mercado Libre (MELI) o Mercado Pago (NONE)
                    por: Indique se é um pagamento Mercado Livre (MELI) ou Mercado Pago (NONE) Marketplace
                notification_url:
                  type: string
                  description: URL where you'd like to receive a payment notification.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: URL where you'd like to receive a payment notification.
                    spa: URL a la cual te gustaría recibir notificaciones de pagos
                    por: URL para a qual você gostaria de receber notificações de pagamentos
                sponsor_id:
                  type: number
                  description: Identifier of the Partners Mercado Pago account. It is used to identify if the integration was performed by a partner.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Identifier of the Partners Mercado Pago account. It is used to identify if the integration was performed by a partner.
                    spa: Identificador de la cuenta de Mercado Pago del Partner. Se utiliza para identificar si la integración fue realizada por algún partner.
                    por: Identificador da conta Mercado Pago do Partnet. É usado para identificar se a integração foi realizada por um partner.
                payer:
                  type: object
                  description: Buyer's information.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Buyer's information.
                    spa: Información del comprador
                    por: Informação do comprador
                  properties:
                    id:
                      type: number
                      description: Buyer id.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Buyer id.
                        spa: Identificador del comprador
                        por: Id do comprador
                      example: 123
                    email:
                      type: string
                      description: Deprecated field, will return an empty string.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Deprecated field, will return an empty string.
                        spa: Campo deprecado, responderá una cadena vacía
                        por: Deprecated field, will return an empty string
                    nickname:
                      type: string
                      description: Buyer nickname.
                      x-description-i18n:
                        eng: Buyer nickname.
                        spa: Nickname del comprador
                        por: Nick do comprador
                      example: JOHN
                site_id:
                  type: string
                  example: MLA
                  description: Site ID.
                  enum:
                    - MLA -- Mercado Libre Argentina
                    - MLB -- Mercado Libre Brasil
                    - MLM -- Mercado Libre México
                    - MLC -- Mercado Libre Chile
                    - MLU -- Mercado Libre Uruguay
                    - MCO -- Mercado Libre Colombia
                    - MPE -- Mercado Libre Perú
                items:
                  type: array
                  description: items information.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: items information.
                    spa: Información de los ítems
                    por: Informação do item
                  items:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: string
                        description: Item id.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item id.
                          spa: Identificador del ítem
                          por: Id do anúncio
                        example: item id
                      category_id:
                        type: string
                        description: This is a free string where the item category can be added.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: This is a free string where the item category can be added.
                          spa: Esto es un string libre donde se puede agregar la categoría del ítem.
                          por: Esta é uma string livre onde a categoria do item pode ser adicionada.
                        example: item category
                      currency_id:
                        $ref: '#/components/schemas/currency_id'
                      description:
                        type: string
                        description: Item description.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item description.
                          spa: Descripción del item
                          por: Descrição do artigo
                        example: item description
                      picture_url:
                        type: string
                        description: Item picture URL.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item picture URL.
                          spa: URL de imagen del ítem
                          por: URL da imagem do anúncio
                        example: item picture
                      quantity:
                        type: number
                        description: Item quantity.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item quantity.
                          spa: Cantidad de producto
                          por: Quantidade do produto
                        example: 1
                      unit_price:
                        type: number
                        description: Item unit price.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item unit price.
                          spa: Precio unitario del ítem
                          por: Preço unitário do item
                        example: 5
                      title:
                        type: string
                        description: Item title. It will be displayed in the payment process.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Item title. It will be displayed in the payment process.
                          spa: Título del ítem, se mostrará en el flujo de pago
                          por: Título do item, é apresentado o fluxo de pagamento
                        example: item title
                additional_info:
                  type: string
                  description: Additional information.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: Additional information.
                    spa: Información adicional
                    por: Informações adicionais
                application_id:
                  type: string
                  description: application identifier.
                  x-description-i18n:
                    eng: application identifier.
                    spa: Identificador de aplicación
                    por: Id do aplicativo
                  example: 10000000000000000
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 9999999999
                    description: Unique identifier of the order generated by Mercado Pago
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique identifier of the order generated by Mercado Pago
                      spa: Identificador único de la orden generada por Mercado Pago
                      por: Identificador único do pedido gerado pelo Mercado Pago
                  status:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/status'
                  external_reference:
                    type: string
                    example: default
                    description: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the order_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the id of their payment system
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the order_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the id of their payment system
                      spa: Identificador único que envía el vendedor para relacionar la order_id generada por Mercado Pago, con el id de su sistema de pagos
                      por: Identificador único enviado pelo vendedor para relacionar o order_id gerado pelo Mercado Pago ao ID do seu sistema de pagamento
                  preference_id:
                    type: string
                    example: Preference identification
                    description: Identifier of the payment preference associated to the order
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Identifier of the payment preference associated to the order
                      spa: Identificador de la preferencia de pago asociado a la orden
                      por: Identificador da preferência de pagamento associada ao pedido
                  collector:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        example: 999999999
                        description: Identifier of the collecting Mercado Pago account
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Identifier of the collecting Mercado Pago account
                          spa: Identificador de la cuenta de Mercado Pago recaudadora
                          por: Identificador da conta coletora do Mercado Pago
                      nickname:
                        type: string
                        format: nullable
                        description: Collector nickname.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Collector nickname.
                          spa: Nickname del collector
                          por: Nick do collector
                    description: Attributes of the Mercado Pago account collecting the payment
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Attributes of the Mercado Pago account collecting the payment
                      spa: Atributos de la cuenta de Mercado Pago recaudadora del pago
                      por: Atributos da conta do Mercado Pago que cobra o pagamento
                  marketplace:
                    type: string
                    example: NONE
                    description: Indicates if it is a Mercado Libre (MELI) or Mercado Pago (NONE) Marketplace payment
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Indicates if it is a Mercado Libre (MELI) or Mercado Pago (NONE) Marketplace payment
                      spa: Indica si es un pago de Marketplace de Mercado Libre (MELI) o Mercado Pago (NONE)
                      por: Indique se é um pagamento Mercado Livre (MELI) ou Mercado Pago (NONE) Marketplace
                  notification_url:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: URL where you'd like to receive a payment or merchant_order notification.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: URL where you'd like to receive a payment or merchant_order notification.
                      spa: URL a la cual se enviará la notificación de pago o merchant_order
                      por: URL em que você gostaria de receber uma notificação de pagamento ou merchant_order
                  date_created:
                    type: string
                    example: 2018-09-14T17:11:31.000Z
                    description: Order creation date. The format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.dcm-GMT, for example 2021-12-29T20:19:17.000-04:00.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Order creation date. The format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.dcm-GMT, for example 2021-12-29T20:19:17.000-04:00.
                      spa: Fecha de creación de la Orden. El formato es YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.dcm-GMT, por ejemplo 2021-12-29T20:19:17.000-04:00.
                      por: Data de criação do pedido. O formato é YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.dcm-GMT, por exemplo 2021-12-29T20:19:17.000-04:00.
                  last_updated:
                    type: string
                    example: 2018-09-14T17:11:43.000Z
                    description: Date of last update of the order. The format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.dcm-GMT, for example 2021-12-29T20:19:17.000-04:00.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Date of last update of the order. The format is YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.dcm-GMT, for example 2021-12-29T20:19:17.000-04:00.
                      spa: Fecha de última actualización de la Orden. El formato es YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.dcm-GMT, por ejemplo 2021-12-29T20:19:17.000-04:00.
                      por: Data da última atualização do pedido. O formato é YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.dcm-GMT, por exemplo 2021-12-29T20:19:17.000-04:00.
                  sponsor_id:
                    type: string
                    format: nullable
                    description: Identifier of the Partners Mercado Pago account. It is used to identify if the integration was performed by a partner.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Identifier of the Partners Mercado Pago account. It is used to identify if the integration was performed by a partner.
                      spa: Identificador de la cuenta de Mercado Pago del Partner. Se utiliza para identificar si la integración fue realizada por algún partner.
                      por: Identificador da conta Mercado Pago do Partnet. É usado para identificar se a integração foi realizada por um partner.
                  shipping_cost:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: Shipping cost, if applicable
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Shipping cost, if applicable
                      spa: Costo de envío, si aplica
                      por: Custo de envio, se aplicável
                  total_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 5
                    description: Total amount of the transaction in local currency.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Total amount of the transaction in local currency.
                      spa: Monto total de la transacción en moneda local
                      por: Valor total da transação na moeda local
                  site_id:
                    type: string
                    example: MLA
                    description: Site ID.
                    enum:
                      - MLA -- Mercado Libre Argentina
                      - MLB -- Mercado Libre Brasil
                      - MLM -- Mercado Libre México
                      - MLC -- Mercado Libre Chile
                      - MLU -- Mercado Libre Uruguay
                      - MCO -- Mercado Libre Colombia
                      - MPE -- Mercado Libre Perú
                  paid_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 5
                    description: Paid amount
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Paid amount
                      spa: Monto pagado
                      por: Valor pago
                  refunded_amount:
                    type: number
                    example: 0
                    description: Refunded amount
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Refunded amount
                      spa: Monto reembolsado
                      por: Valor reembolsado
                  payer:
                    type: object
                    properties:
                      id:
                        type: number
                        example: 999999999
                        description: Payer ID.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payer ID.
                          spa: Identificador de pagador
                          por: Identificador de pagador
                      email:
                        type: string
                        description: Payer’s email address.
                        x-description-i18n:
                          eng: Payer’s email address.
                          spa: E-mail del pagador
                          por: E-mail do pagante
                    description: Buyer's information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Buyer's information.
                      spa: Información del comprador
                      por: Informação do comprador
                  items:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: string
                          example: item id
                          description: Item id.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Item id.
                            spa: Identificador del ítem
                            por: Id do anúncio
                        category_id:
                          type: string
                          example: item category
                          description: This is a free string where the item category can be added.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: This is a free string where the item category can be added.
                            spa: Esto es un string libre donde se puede agregar la categoría del ítem.
                            por: Esta é uma string livre onde a categoria do item pode ser adicionada.
                        currency_id:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/currency_id'
                        description:
                          type: string
                          example: item description
                          description: Item description.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Item description.
                            spa: Descripción del item
                            por: Descrição do artigo
                        picture_url:
                          type: string
                          example: item picture url
                          description: Item image URL.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Item image URL.
                            spa: URL de imagen del ítem
                            por: URL da imagem do anúncio
                        title:
                          type: string
                          example: item title
                          description: Item title. It will be displayed in the payment process.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Item title. It will be displayed in the payment process.
                            spa: Título del ítem, se mostrará en el flujo de pago
                            por: Título do item, é apresentado o fluxo de pagamento
                        quantity:
                          type: number
                          example: 1
                          description: Item quantity.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Item quantity.
                            spa: Cantidad de producto
                            por: Quantidade do produto
                        unit_price:
                          type: number
                          example: 5
                          description: Item unit price.
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Item unit price.
                            spa: Precio unitario del ítem
                            por: Preço unitário do item
                    description: Order item attributes
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Order item attributes
                      spa: Atributos de los items de la orden
                      por: Atributos dos itens do pedido
                  cancelled:
                    type: boolean
                    description: Boolean value that indicates if the order was cancelled
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Boolean value that indicates if the order was cancelled
                      spa: Valor booleano que indica si la orden fue cancelada
                      por: Valor booleano que indica se o pedido foi cancelado
                  additional_info:
                    type: string
                    example: additional information
                    description: Additional information.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Additional information.
                      spa: Información adicional
                      por: Informações adicionais
                  application_id:
                    type: string
                    example: 10000000000000000
                    description: application identifier.
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: application identifier.
                      spa: Identificador de aplicación
                      por: Id do aplicativo
                  order_status:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/order_status'
        '400':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - invalid_user_id--invalid users involved.
                      - invalid_order_state--the action requested is not valid for the current merchant order state.
                      - invalid_string--string too long.
                      - invalid_application_id--internal server error.
                      - invalid_items--invalid unit_price.
                      - user_not_allowed--user not allowed to operate.
                      - invalid_operation_type--invalid operation type.
                      - invalid_payer--invalid payer identifier.
                      - invalid_id--invalid preference_id.
                      - invalid_expired--the preference_id has expired.
                      - invalid_sponsor_id--invalid sponsor_id.
                      - invalid_marketplace--invalid marketplace.
                      - unmarshal_error--could not unmarshal request body into merchant order struct.
                      - invalid_url--invalid URL. Isn't HTTP or HTTPS.
                      - communication_error--Error when calling...
        '401':
          description: Error
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Error
            spa: Error
            por: Erro
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  errorKey:
                    type: string
                    enum:
                      - invalid_token--access denied.
                      - invalid_caller_id--invalid caller_id
  /merchant_orders/search:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
      summary: Search orders
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Search orders
        spa: Buscar en órdenes
        por: Buscar em pedidos
      description: Find all the information of the orders generated through specific filters or a specific date range
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Find all the information of the orders generated through specific filters or a specific date range
        spa: Encuentra toda la información de las órdenes generadas a través de filtros específicos o por un rango de fechas determinado
        por: Encontre todas as informações dos pedidos gerados através de filtros específicos ou por um intervalo de datas específico
      parameters:
        - name: status
          in: query
          description: Merchant order state.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Merchant order state.
            spa: Estado de la orden.
            por: Status do pedido.
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: preference_id
          in: query
          description: Payment preference identifier associated to the merchant order.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Payment preference identifier associated to the merchant order.
            spa: Identificador de la preferencia de pago asociado a la orden
            por: Identificação da preferência de pagamento associados à ordem
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: application_id
          in: query
          description: application identifier.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: application identifier.
            spa: Identificador de aplicación
            por: Id do aplicativo
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: payer_id
          in: query
          description: Payer ID.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Payer ID.
            spa: Identificador de pagador
            por: Identificador de pagador
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: sponsor_id
          in: query
          description: Sponsor ID in Mercado Pago.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Sponsor ID in Mercado Pago.
            spa: Identificador del sponsor en Mercado Pago
            por: Sponsor ID in Mercado Pago
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: external_reference
          in: query
          description: Reference you can synchronize with your payment system.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Reference you can synchronize with your payment system.
            spa: Referencia que puedes sincronizar con tu sistema de pagos
            por: Referência que pode sincronizar com seu sistema de pagamentos
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: site_id
          in: query
          description: Country identifier that merchant order belongs to.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Country identifier that merchant order belongs to.
            spa: Identificador de país al que pertenece la orden
            por: Identificador do país a que pertence a ordem
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: marketplace
          in: query
          description: 'Origin of the payment. Default value: ''NONE'''
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: 'Origin of the payment. Default value: ''NONE'''
            spa: 'Origen del pago. Valor predeterminado: ''NONE'''
            por: 'Origem do pagamento. Valor padrão: ''NONE'''
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: date_created_from
          in: query
          description: Order´s creation date (start search)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: date_created_to
          in: query
          description: Order´s creation date (end search)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: last_updated_from
          in: query
          description: Order´s last update date (start search)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: last_updated_to
          in: query
          description: Order´s last update date (end search)
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: items
          in: query
          description: items information.
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: items information.
            spa: Información de los ítems
            por: Informação do item
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: limit
          in: query
          description: Maximum quantity of items to be returned
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Maximum quantity of items to be returned
            spa: Cantidad máxima de artículos para devolver
            por: Número máximo de itens a serem devolvidos
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
        - name: offset
          in: query
          description: Maximum quantity of items to offset
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Maximum quantity of items to offset
            spa: Cantidad máxima de artículos para offset
            por: Número máximo de itens para offsets
          required: false
          schema:
            type: string
            example: 12123adfasdf123u4u
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  elements:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: number
                          example: 9999999999
                          description: id
                        status:
                          $ref: '#/components/schemas/status'
                        external_reference:
                          type: string
                          example: default
                          description: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the order_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the id of their payment system
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the order_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the id of their payment system
                            spa: Identificador único que envía el vendedor para relacionar la order_id generada por Mercado Pago, con el id de su sistema de pagos
                            por: Identificador único enviado pelo vendedor para relacionar o order_id gerado pelo Mercado Pago ao ID do seu sistema de pagamento
                        preference_id:
                          type: string
                          example: Preference identification
                          description: Identifier of the payment preference associated to the order
                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Identifier of the payment preference associated to the order

  /merchant_orders/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
        - $ref: '#/tags/checkout-pro'
        - $ref: '#/tags/qr-code'
      summary: Get order
      x-summary-i18n:
        eng: Get order
        spa: Obtener orden
        por: Obter pedido
      description: Check the payment information for a product or service with the ID of the order you want
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Check the payment information for a product or service with the ID of the order you want
        spa: Consulta toda la información de pago de un producto o servicio con el ID de la orden que quieras
        por: Veja todas as informações de pagamento de um produto ou serviço com a identificação do pedido de sua escolha
      parameters:
        - name: id
          in: path
          description: Unique identifier of the order generated by Mercado Pago
          x-description-i18n:
            eng: Unique identifier of the order generated by Mercado Pago
            spa: Identificador único de la orden generada por Mercado Pago
            por: Identificador único do pedido gerado pelo Mercado Pago
          required: true
          schema:
            type: number
            example: 123123123
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Success
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  id:
                    type: number
                    example: 9999999999
                    description: Unique identifier of the order generated by Mercado Pago
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique identifier of the order generated by Mercado Pago
                      spa: Identificador único de la orden generada por Mercado Pago
                      por: Identificador único do pedido gerado pelo Mercado Pago
                  status:
                    $ref: '#/components/schemas/status'

                    type: string
                    example: default
                    description: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the order_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the id of their payment system
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Unique identifier sent by the seller to relate the order_id generated by Mercado Pago, with the id of their payment system
                      spa: Identificador único que envía el vendedor para relacionar la order_id generada por Mercado Pago, con el id de su sistema de pagos
                      por: Identificador único enviado pelo vendedor para relacionar o order_id gerado pelo Mercado Pago ao ID do seu sistema de pagamento
                  preference_id:
                    type: string
                    example: Preference identification
                    description: Identifier of the payment preference associated to the order
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Identifier of the payment preference associated to the order
                      spa: Identificador de la preferencia de pago asociado a la orden
                      por: Identificador da preferência de pagamento associada ao pedido
                  payments:
                    type: array
                    description: Payment Attributes associated with the Order
                    x-description-i18n:
                      eng: Payment Attributes associated with the Order
                      spa: Atributos de Pagos asociados a la Orden
                      por: Atributos de pagamento associados ao pedido
                    items:
                      type: object
                      properties:
                        id:
                          type: number
                          example: 9999999999

                          x-description-i18n:
                            eng: Unique Payment Identifier, automatically generated by Mercado Pago
                            spa: Identificador único del pago, generado automáticamente por Mercado Pago
                            por: Identificador único de pagamento, gerado automaticamente pelo Mercado Pago
                        transaction_amount:

                            spa: Monto total del intento de pago. Es la suma de dinero que se le deposita al seller. Campo numérico.

components:
  schemas:
    status:
      type: string
      description: Show the current merchant order state.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Show the current merchant order state.
        spa: Muestra el estado actual de la orden
        por: Exibe o estado atual da ordem
      example: closed
      enum:
        - opened -- Order without payments.
        - closed -- Order with payments covering total amount.
        - expired -- Canceled order that does not have approved or pending payments (all rejected or returned).
    currency_id:
      type: string
      description: ID of the currency used in the payment.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: ID of the currency used in the payment.
        spa: Identificador de la moneda utilizada en el pago
        por: Identificador da moeda utilizada no pagamento
      example: BRL
      enum:
        - ARS -- Argentine peso.
        - BRL -- Brazil real.
        - CLP -- Chilean peso.
        - MXN -- Mexican peso.
        - COP -- Colombian peso.
        - PEN -- Peruvian sol.
        - UYU -- Uruguayan peso.
    payment_status:
      type: string
      description: Payment status.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Payment status.
        spa: Estado del pago
        por: Estado do pagamento
      example: approved
      enum:
        - pending -- The user has not yet completed the payment process.
        - approved -- The payment has been approved and accredited.
        - authorized -- The payment has been authorized but not captured yet.
        - in_process -- Payment is being reviewed.
        - in_mediation -- Users have initiated a dispute.
        - rejected -- Payment was rejected. The user may retry payment.
        - cancelled -- Payment was cancelled by one of the parties or because time for payment has expired.
        - refunded -- Payment was refunded to the user.
        - charged_back -- Was made a chargeback in the buyer's credit card.
    operation_type:
      type: string
      description: Operation data_type.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Operation data_type.
        spa: data_type de la operación
        por: data_type da operação
      enum:
        - regular_payment -- Typification by default of a purchase being paid using Mercado Pago.
        - payment_addition -- Addition of money to an existing payment, made through a Mercado Pago account.
        - money_transfer -- Funds transfer between two users.
        - recurring_payment -- Automatic recurring payment due to an active user subscription.
        - account_fund -- Money income in the user's account.
        - cellphone_recharge -- Recharge of a user's cellophone account.
        - pos_payment -- Payment done through a Point of Sale.
    order_status:
      type: string
      description: Current merchant order status given the payments status.
      x-description-i18n:
        eng: Current merchant order status given the payments status.
        spa: Estado actual de la orden según el estado de los pagos
        por: Current merchant order status given the payments status
      example: paid
      enum:
        - payment_required -- Order without payments or with all payments "rejected" or "cancelled".
        - reverted -- Order with all payments "refunded" or "chargeback".
        - paid -- Order with the sum of all payments "approved", "chargeback" or "in_mediation", covers the order total amount.
        - partially_reverted -- Order with at least one payment "refunded" or "chargeback".
        - partially_paid -- Order with at least one payment "approved" and not covering order total amount.
        - payment_in_process -- Order with payments "in_process", "pending" or "authorized".
        - undefined -- Order created before the existence of the order_status status.
        - expired -- Canceled order that does not have approved or pending payments (all rejected or returned).
